      • generateRandomDoubleBetween

        public static double generateRandomDoubleBetween​(double lowerLimit,
                                                 double upperLimit)
        Generates a random double between two limits. Both limits are inclusive.
        Parameters:
        lowerLimit - the lower limit.
        upperLimit - the upper limit.
        Returns:
        a random double bigger or equals lowerLimit and smaller or equals upperLimit.

      • generateRandomFloatBetween

        Generates a random float between two limits. Both limits are inclusive.
        Parameters:
        lowerLimit - the lower limit.
        upperLimit - the upper limit.
        Returns:
        a random float bigger or equals lowerLimit and smaller or equals upperLimit.

      • compareDoubles

        public static boolean compareDoubles​(double a,
                                     double b)
        Compares two doubles for equality.
        Parameters:
        a - the first double.
        b - the second double.
        Returns:
        true if both doubles contain the same value or the absolute deviation between them is below EPSILON.

      • compareFloats

        public static boolean compareFloats​(float a,
                                    float b)
        Compares two floats for equality.
        Parameters:
        a - the first floats.
        b - the second floats.
        Returns:
        true if both floats contain the same value or the absolute deviation between them is below EPSILON.
